channel.title: SharePoint on Kamil Rithaler
channel.description: Recent content in SharePoint on Kamil Rithaler

item.title: Build and deploy SPFx form customizer
item.description: Today Microsoft released the latest version of SPFx (v1.15). This version comes with the feature that I waited most for (and probably many SharePoint developers). This is a possibility to create a “native” list item custom form. Until this day, it was a very hacky process of making a custom webpart and redirecting users to it by using custom actions or list view JSON customizers. Now, this development model is fully supported by SPFx.
